relevant_findings.description: Document tracks travel details of Jack Rubenstein (Jack Ruby)
relevant_findings.direct_quote: He arrived on May 17 and departed on June 7, accompanied by his wife Mimi
relevant_findings.significance: Provides documented movement of Jack Ruby, potentially useful for establishing his whereabouts and activities

relevant_findings.description: Brief biographical information about Jack Rubenstein
relevant_findings.direct_quote: The only Jack RUBENSTEIN known to have arrived in ISRAEL during 1962 and stated that he is a native of POLAND, born 1905, and a resident of NEW YORK
relevant_findings.significance: Provides background context on Jack Ruby, though limited direct connection to Oswald is shown in this document
